projects.title: Kollaboscope
projects.description: A web app for creating collaborative YouTube playlists (a feature that does not exist as of late 2017) without requiring any login. A unique URL is generated for each playlist for sharing, and adding a song updates all users in real time.

projects.title: eargASMR
projects.description: A mobile app for creating customized ASMR/meditation experiences. This was a group project where I contributed much of the logic and teammates provided the sound effects and stylings. Volume is adjustable for each sound independently.

projects.title: DRY-Draw
projects.description: A web app for taking a single SVG (or any XML file) and embedding variables such that it can represent multiple permutations. E.g. a technical drawing for an iPhone can have home button that exists if version != X. Uses parameter currying so unknown variable values do not cause errors.
